string-array.name: featured_text_array
string-array.item: Searching Teachers, Mentors, Couching or boot camp Dume got you all covered
Dume will find you the best mentor on your demand, whenever you need
Finding tution was never been easier, just sign in as a mentor and get started
Reach maximam people with Dume and let your talent shine
You never really learn something until you teach it, So start sharing your skill with dume
